blueprint.description: Installs Packer (an automation tool for building machine images) on nearly any platform
blueprint.overview: [Packer](https://www.packer.io/) is a free and open source tool for creating golden images for multiple platforms from a single source configuration. Packer is lightweight, runs on every major operating system, and is highly performant, creating machine images for multiple platforms in parallel. It is a [HashiCorp](https://www.hashicorp.com/) product.
blueprint.name: Packer
blueprint.title: Packer
